attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the electorate of the united kingdom call upon the goverment to  immediately reform all and any payment so members of parliament in such a way that not only is the system transparent but also with rigid rules . any member not adhering strictly to  these rules should be subject to  immediate recall and have to  face their constituents on vote of no confidence

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
